scripts.//comment2: Run with: 'dry --dry-save-package-json-to package-merged.json --dry-keep-package-json i' or 'npm-uib i' #
scripts.//comment3: Using the package this way will allow to have multiple package.json files (e.g. one in uib-components). The command merges the files given in the dry-section below
scripts._prepare: function npm-uib() { dry --dry-save-package-json-to package-merged.json --dry-keep-package-json }; export -f npm-uib
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules uib-components/node_modules; rm -f package-lock.json uib-components/package-lock.json
scripts.buildclean: dry --dry-save-package-json-to package-merged.json --dry-keep-package-json run clean && dry --dry-save-package-json-to package-merged.json --dry-keep-package-json run build #&& dry --dry-save-package-json-to package-merged.json --dry-keep-package-json run dev
scripts.buildclean-lib: cd uib-components && dry --dry-save-package-json-to package-merged.json --dry-keep-package-json run buildclean
scripts.prod: nuxt generate ui/ && dry --dry-save-package-json-to package-merged.json --dry-keep-package-json run start
scripts.lint:all: dry --dry-save-package-json-to package-merged.json --dry-keep-package-json run lint-ui && dry --dry-save-package-json-to package-merged.json --dry-keep-package-json run lint-components
